mapper.select: select id, postid, parent, email, url, ip, agent, content, approved, creator, createTime from comment where id = #{id}
select c.id, c.postid, c.url, c.email, c.ip, c.content, c.creator, c.approved, c.createTime, p.title from comment c left join post p on c.postid=p.id
select c.id, c.content, c.creator, c.createTime, p.title from comment c left join post p on c.postid=p.id order by c.createTime desc limit 10
select id, content, creator, url, parent, createTime from comment c where postid=#{postid} and approved order by c.createTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment(id,postid, parent, email, url, ip, agent,content,approved, creator, createTime) values(#{id},#{postid},#{parent},#{email},#{url},#{ip},#{agent},#{content},#{approved},#{creator},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update comment set approved=not(approved) where id=#{commentid}
